name: Reverie of the Lost
description:
A surreal, mystery-adventure visual novel.

Rated 16+

_____

Follow Yoru as he meets a mysterious girl who leads him to an alien realm of existence known as "Ylliusura".  

As he proceeds to learn more about the mysterious realm, and it's connection to his own world, he begins to unravel eon-aged secrets. 

And unknowingly sparks a war against ancient forces intent on ravaging humanity. 

“Alas, fate weaves its own wicked threads.”

_____

< Features >

- 60,000+ word script

- 4 character sprites with numerous expressions and poses

- 7 unique backgrounds

- 5 event CGs

- 8+ music tracks

Note that is is a kinetic novel. As such, there are no choices that can be made, or separate branches of the story which can be explored.

< Controls >

Enter / Space / MouseScrollDown (Outside textbox) - Proceed text

MouseScrollDown (Inside textbox) - Scroll through current text

H - Hide UI

Tab - Open / Close log

Escape - Open / Close menu

< Meet the team > < Content advisory >

Use of profanities, References to sex, References to/occurrences of torture and rape (not graphically represented), Occurrences of blood and death.
